perturbation.original_text: Term Section 1.01. Term. The term of this Agreement shall be effective as of the date first stated above and shall continue for a term of three (3) years, unless terminated earlier in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement (the "Term"); provided, however, that PrimeCall may elect to terminate this Agreement, upon thirty (30) days' written notice, at any time from and after the time that collectively RSL Communications, Ltd. and/or its Affiliates holds less than fifty percent (50%) of the voting control of DeltaThree's outstanding shares. "Affiliate" as used in this Agreement shall mean any person directly or indirectly controlling or controlled by or under direct or indirect common control with such person.
perturbation.changed_text: Term Section 1.01. Term. The term of this Agreement shall be effective as of the date first stated above and shall continue for a term of three (3) years, unless terminated earlier in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement (the "Term"); provided, however, that PrimeCall may elect to terminate this Agreement, upon thirty (30) days' written notice, only if RSL Communications, Ltd. and its Affiliates cease to have any voting control of DeltaThree's outstanding shares. "Affiliate" as used in this Agreement shall mean any person directly controlling such person.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows termination if RSL Com and affiliates hold LESS than 50% voting control, while the modified text requires them to hold NO voting control at all to trigger termination rights. The definition of Affiliate is also changed to only include directly controlled persons rather than indirect control, which limits how affiliate is defined. This is an in-text contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: Section 3.04 [Sales and Distribution]. Sales and Distribution. PrimeCall's sales force shall assist in selling the Calling Card and PrimeCall shall handle all aspects of the distribution of the Calling Card, including without limitation, the negotiation of agreements with distributors, inventory control, billing and collections. All such agreements shall be approved in advance by DeltaThree. DeltaThree shall be responsible for all costs in connection with such sales and distribution efforts.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 3.04 [Sales and Distribution]. Sales and Distribution. PrimeCall's sales force shall assist in selling the Calling Card, but DeltaThree retains ultimate authority over all aspects of the distribution of the Calling Card, including without limitation, the negotiation of agreements with distributors, inventory control, billing and collections. Only key agreements with distributors must be approved in advance by DeltaThree. DeltaThree shall be responsible for all incremental costs in connection with such sales and distribution efforts if they exceed $10,000.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states PrimeCall handles all aspects of distribution. The modified text states that DeltaThree retains ultimate authority. The original text requires ALL agreements to be approved while the modified one states only 'key' agreements need approval. The original text states that DeltaThree is responsible for ALL costs, while the modified text adds a caveat that they're only responsible for incremental costs exceeding $10,000.

perturbation.original_text: Section 9.09 [Assignment]. Assignment. This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. This Agreement may not be assigned by DeltaThree without the prior written consent of PrimeCall. PrimeCall may assign this Agreement to any affiliate of PrimeCall or in connection with a merger or consolidation of PrimeCall or a sale of all or substantially all of PrimeCall's business. Except as provided in the preceding sentence, this Agreement may not be assigned by PrimeCall without the prior written consent of DeltaThree.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 9.09 [Assignment]. Assignment. This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. This Agreement may not be assigned by DeltaThree under any circumstances. PrimeCall may assign this Agreement to any entity regardless of affiliation or business connection. Except as provided in the preceding sentence, this Agreement may not be assigned by PrimeCall without notifying DeltaThree.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that DeltaThree may not assign the agreement without written consent of PrimeCall while the modified text states that DeltaThree may not assign the agreement under any circumstances. In the original text PrimeCall may assign this Agreement to any affiliate of PrimeCall or in connection with a merger or consolidation of PrimeCall or a sale of all or substantially all of PrimeCall's business. The modified text states that PrimeCall may assign this Agreement to any entity regardless of affiliation or business connection. Original text states that the Agreement may not be assigned by PrimeCall without the prior written consent of DeltaThree. The modified version states that Agreement may not be assigned by PrimeCall without notifying DeltaThree.
